ComicInfo.Title: Blake's Menagerie
ComicInfo.Summary: Blake's Menagerie: While visiting an exhibit of Viking artifacts, Thor accidentally releases Rimthursar's Menagerie who where imprisoned in a silver chalice.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:29:27. [Issue ID 36456]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Kyrie [Shawna Lynde] (introduction),Slithgarn,Heimdall (cameo),Vizier,Odin,Borna,Grult [Thorne Kirby] (introduction),Thor,Fairgold [Miss Stevens] (introduction),Rimthursar (villain, introduction, flashback),Jolena
